attributes.action: All EU or Other should come to Britain with private health insurance. I have proof that Spain does not always honour the E111 card.
attributes.additional_details:
To Jerermy Hunt. - All EU or Others should come with
Private Health Insurance.  I have experience in
Tenerife where they would NOT honour the E111
card.  We are the only country that abides by the
rules. I can send you proof of the costl if you so wish.
20 yrs in NHS seeing Russians who are not
resident having £10,000 heart ops.Knowing full
well they have been brought to this country. ACT NOW!!!

rejection.details: Please see: NHS Foreign Nationals treatment payment
